To
vendor
a
new
version
of
SQLite
:
.
/
mach
vendor
third_party
/
sqlite3
/
moz
.
yaml
To
vendor
new
versions
of
SQLite
extensions
check
for
moz
.
yaml
files
in
ext
/
subfolders
.
For
example
to
vendor
sqlite
-
vec
:
.
/
mach
vendor
third_party
/
sqlite3
/
ext
/
sqlite
-
vec
/
moz
.
yaml
Vendoring
tracks
GitHub
tags
specific
tags
can
be
targeted
using
the
-
-
revision
option
.
